module.name: Core
module.changelog: *13.0.118.6* FREEPBX-13726 Dont set huntmembers to 0 *13.0.118.5* FREEPBX-12962 Fix ajax call to add astmodules *13.0.118.4* FREEPBX-13980 Populating CallerID field in Trunk dial patterns doesnt work *13.0.118.3* FREEPBX-14035 Fix editing of a trunk to differentate from delete *13.0.118.2* FREEPBX-14035 Fix typo when deleting trunks causing whoops error *13.0.118.1* FREEPBX-13831, FREEPBX-13726 *13.0.118* FREEPBX-13906 Moved trunk delete in to the class *13.0.117.4* Remove the chown command because the hooks folder permissions are set correctly *13.0.117.3* FREEPBX-13442 Bulk handler exports vmexten but doesnt import it *13.0.117.2* FREEPBX-13793 Move log files into respective modules *13.0.117.1* FREEPBX-7373 Hide *11/*12 feature codes by default exposed with Advanced Settings or if in deviceanduser mode *13.0.117* FREEPBX-12814 Add defaultuser setting to extension *13.0.116.1* FREEPBX-13504 Asterisk Modules: error on invalid input of module to add *13.0.116* FREEPBX-12331, FREEPBX-13481 Enable 'outbound proxy' in PJSIP *13.0.115.5* FREEPBX-13516 Do not send pjsip registrations when disabled *13.0.115.4* FREEPBX-9645 Return to same tab on submit in Asterisk Modules *13.0.115.3* FREEPBX-12364 Quick Create choose correct driver *13.0.115.2* FREEPBX-12577 dont go to voicemail from an ivr *13.0.115.1* FREEPBX-12577 fix broken invalid entries in direct dial ivr *13.0.115* Dial-one and dial macros now have consistent variables *13.0.114.2* FREEPBX-13409 Dont load soundlangs until its really needed *13.0.114.1* FREEPBX-13209 Only get endpoint if needed *13.0.114* FREEPBX-13364 Ability to set Ringer Volumes *13.0.113.10* Fix dialparties inheritance *13.0.113.9* FREEPBX-11842 Stop using datalists for custom selects *13.0.113.8* FREEPBX-13318 add AMPBIN to the list of globals that will be extracted at the top of the extensions_additional.conf file *13.0.113.7* FREEPBX-12760 Set all keys to lowercase on bulkimport *13.0.113.6* FREEPBX-12215 Add diversion headers for PJSIP *13.0.113.5* FREEPBX-10054 Add send PAI/RPID to PJSIP advanced trunk settings *13.0.113.4* FREEPBX-13135 E_WARNING error on Outbound Route submit with dial patterns *13.0.113.3* FREEPBX-12255 add process hook *13.0.113.2* FREEPBX-13055 inbound routes destination labels for core, FREEPBX-13001 timeconditions hangup destinations, FREEPBX-10405 PJSIP to-header in from-pstn *13.0.113.1* FREEPBX-13055 Inbound Routes Label clarification *13.0.113* FREEPBX-13153 Write out SIPUSERAGENT in core *13.0.112* Fix cnam issue in CDR reports *13.0.111* tcpenable not enabletcp for TCP transport checks *13.0.110* FREEPBX-13039 BLF issues for calls *13.0.109* Don't generate out transports that are invalid *13.0.108* FREEPBX-12752 *13.0.107* Fix json_decode if it spits back a null string *13.0.106* Comment functions and reorganize *13.0.105* FREEPBX-12837 pjsip extension with mutliple contacts only rings one contact when extension is included in a ring group *13.0.104* FREEPBX-12887 *13.0.103* FREEPBX-11764, FREEPBX-12605, FREEPBX-12798, FREEPBX-12484, FREEPBX-12639, FREEPBX-12721, FREEPBX-12805, FREEPBX-12840 *13.0.102* Noload a few more pjsip modules *13.0.101* FREEPBX-12620 add language to pjsip trunks *13.0.100* FREEPBX-12708 fix export with no data *13.0.99* Add sound languages: it,fr,en_GB *13.0.98* Allow arbitrary sections in pjsip configuration *13.0.97* Address concerns re digium. Thanks Scott! *13.0.96* ASTNOW-436 allow addEndpoint to create non-device sections *13.0.95* FREEPBX-12608 Add a field for PJSIP extensions to set device_state_busy_at *13.0.94* FREEPBX-9281 remove new user option when creating a device in UD mode *13.0.93* FREEPBX-10264 Don't auto-answer when in a queue *13.0.92* FREEPBX-12408 Regression: DID using keywords in cid field *13.0.91* Fix verification of DIDs *13.0.90* Display the ports that are being used in a more comprehensible fashion. *13.0.89* FREEPBX-12192 Update validation, FREEPBX-12281 variable naming, FREEPBX-12286 Fix dialplan logic for AMPBADNUMBER *13.0.88* FREEPBX-12345 Only replace dialopts not the string *13.0.87* FREEPBX-12325 only use PJSIP or SIP when they are the driver *13.0.86* FREEPBX-8801 Move some paging functionality into paging *13.0.85* FREEPBX-12271 IVR Direct Dial no longer working with Device and User mode *13.0.84* FREEPBX-11597 reset form after quick create page change *13.0.83* FREEPBX-8981 add automon back into featuremap as it doesnt seem to conflict *13.0.82* FREEPBX-12013 remove invalid dtmf none option, add valid auto option *13.0.81* FREEPBX-11826 import answermode *13.0.75* Fix missing data on edit *13.0.74* Session timers needs to be labeled something else *13.0.73* FREEPBX-11969 FREEPBX-12015 FREEPBX-12074 FREEPBX-12076 FREEPBX-12085 FREEPBX-11915 FREEPBX-10569 *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10666, FREEPBX-10691, FREEPBX-10628, FREEPBX-10627 *13.0.9* Speed up inbound routes ten fold. *13.0.8* Clean up some deprecated function calls to reduce noise on large systems *13.0.7* Slide out menus and cosmetic updates *13.0.6* Combine buttons into a single dropdown button *13.0.5* Add the possibility of terminating the call with the no service message *13.0.4* FREEPBX-10496 run needreload when reordering routes *13.0.3* Use floating rnav style listings *13.0.2* First stable release *13.0.1RC1.17* FREEPBX-10528 Move dialpattern npa npx lookup to AJAX handler *13.0.1RC1.16* FREEPBX-10484 Fix extension form validation *13.0.1RC1.15* FREEPBX-10459 Fix macro-dial-one to evaluate blank dialstrings. *13.0.1RC1.14* FREEPBX-10382 Allow dot in usernames on administrators page. *13.0.1RC1.13* FREEPBX-10411 Hide empty categories in advanced settings, FREEPBX-10408 PJSIP Trunk advanced tooltips, other cleanup, FREEPBX-10445 Fix array in routing *13.0.1RC1.12* Fix saving of values *13.0.1RC1.11* FREEPBX-100329 Fix validation for outbound routes *13.0.1RC1.10* FREEPBX-10306 Fix trunk order updating in routing. Add toast to reflect success. FREEPBX-10318 attempt to circumvent browser autocomplete circumvention *13.0.1RC1.9* FREEPBX-8340 Allow PJSip trunks with or without reg/auth *13.0.1RC1.8* Fix invalid js selector and cleanup multiple rows in textarea *13.0.1RC1.7* FREEPBX-10275 Account for bulk pattern box in routing validation. *13.0.1RC1.6* FREEPBX-10227 FREEPBX-10110 Add progress to blackhole destinations that don't answer, FREEPBX-10252 keep atleast one dial pattern row *13.0.1RC1.5* FREEPBX-10227 in outbound routes as well *13.0.1RC1.4* FREEPBX-10227 show mohclass on refresh *13.0.1RC1.3* FREEPBX-10221 Add outbound dialprefix to dialplan manipulation tab *13.0.1RC1.2* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *13.0.1RC1.1* fix for the "Unknown or unavailable item requested: 'reversecharge'" warning which some users with non ISDN/PRI trunks have been seeing *13.0.1RC1* Release Candidate 1 *13.0.1beta1.29* FREEPBX-10117 IPv6 updates, reverse charge add false, Add toast to inbound routes for order changes, FREEPBX-10138 fix delete dial rules in routing *13.0.1beta1.28* FREEPBX-10117 Quick Create Extensions not allowing you to dial between extensions *13.0.1beta1.27* FREEPBX-10051 Outbound Route patterns, allow empty if there is a file on import *13.0.1beta1.26* FREEPBX-9939 can not delete outbound route *13.0.1beta1.25* FREEPBX-9913 Timegroup view routing, FREEPBX-9985 Feature SIP Secret generated size, FREEPBX-9931 i18n Audio errors *13.0.1beta1.24* Fix layout issue in Advanced Settings *13.0.1beta1.23* FREEPBX-9886 Bug in trying to disable call waiting and find me follow me grid display fixes *13.0.1beta1.22* FREEPBX-9869 Move IAX secret into main tab *13.0.1beta1.21* FREEPBX-9856 Use the CID if presented *13.0.1beta1.20* Fix faulty bug from core addition *13.0.1beta1.19* FREEPBX-9810 Add post include to most PJSIP files *13.0.1beta1.18* Use new getBinds format *13.0.1beta1.17* FREEPBX-9806 Fix regression from FREEPBX-9753 *13.0.1beta1.16* FREEPBX-9450 fix misspelling on js *13.0.1beta1.15* FREEPBX-9760 wrong dial string *13.0.1beta1.14* FREEPBX-9753 add accountcode for pjsip 12.5.0, FREEPBX-8492 remove duplicated macro outisbusy *13.0.1beta1.13* Revert FREEPBX-8046 to fix FREEPBX-9728 *13.0.1beta1.12* FREEPBX-9717 add correct classes to tabs *13.0.1beta1.11* FREEPBX-9622 Add hook into delUsers and delDevices so other modules can hook into delete processes *13.0.1beta1.10* FREEPBX-9699 unable to save edits to extensions *13.0.1beta1.9* Fix missing buttons in Device and User mode reported in IRC *13.0.1beta1.8* FREEPBX-9685 Dont require email address on quick create, FREEPBX-9684 show apply config after ajax delete *13.0.1beta1.7* Add DID, callerid, and destination to DID bulkhandler validation page *13.0.1beta1.6* Add back missing account field *13.0.1beta1.5* FREEPBX-9509 Cant enable recording external outbound calls from extension *13.0.1beta1.4* FREEPBX-9544 fixes error when changing sip drivers *13.0.1beta1.3* Fix device and user display to accurately reflect correct items *13.0.1beta1.2* FREEPBX-9513 Core:Hangup in inbound routes table leads to 404 error, FREEPBX-9533 error *13.0.1beta1* Bump to beta. Prep for launch *13.0.1alpha35* FREEPBX-9491 List specific destinations in inbound routes chart *13.0.1alpha34* Add Spanish prompts *13.0.1alpha33* FREEPBX-9459 Dialpattern Field Display Issues *13.0.1alpha32* FREEPBX-9461, FREEPBX-8823 Implement a few more features into PJSIP that were missing *13.0.1alpha31* Add tab scrolls to devices *13.0.1alpha30* Fixed: FREEPBX-9446, FREEPBX-9447, FREEPBX-9448, FREEPBX-9449, FREEPBX-9450, FREEPBX-9457 *13.0.1alpha29* When in readonly mode in advanced settings dont just hide the rows, dont even put them in the dom *13.0.1alpha28* FREEPBX-9439 After deleting extension, Quick Create thinks it still exists until reload *13.0.1alpha27* Move features from extension settings into the table *13.0.1alpha26* FREEPBX-9430 If user is empty don't return invalid data *13.0.1alpha25* Fixes: FREEPBX-9419, FREEPBX-9359, FREEPBX-9427, FREEPBX-9426, FREEPBX-9428, FREEPBX-9431 *13.0.1alpha24* FREEPBX-9419 Fixes to looping over invalid arrays *13.0.1alpha23* Looping issue *13.0.1alpha22* Fix advanced settings page display *13.0.1alpha21* FREEPBX-7280 Dynamically generate extensions.conf, FREEPBX-8324 Ensure dialparties calls ALL the pjsip endpoints, FREEPBX-8860 - Add PJSIP Header support to macro-dial and macro-dial-one, FREEPBX-9164 *13.0.1alpha20* Add missing sections back into admin *13.0.1alpha19* Clear cache when deleting things *13.0.1alpha18* Declare the correct namespace name *13.0.1alpha17* Return an array if empty not a null *13.0.1alpha16* Dynamic hints phase 1, core speed up improvements *13.0.1alpha15* add sorting, mass delete and fixes FREEPBX-9193 *13.0.1alpha14* wrap in quotes to prevent an invalid syntax error on transfer if no ringtimer set *13.0.1alpha13* Fix outbound CID issues and address FREEPBX-5894 On outbound calls, phones show outbound Caller ID, even when hidden flag is set *13.0.1alpha12* Fix outstanding bugs with javascript on the trunks page *13.0.1alpha11* FREEPBX-8929, FREEPBX-8930, FREEPBX-8974 Add additional settings to pjsip trunks, reorganize pjsip trunks, fix pjsip trunks so they work *13.0.1alpha10* FREEPBX-8859 Add WSS Support to chan sip *13.0.1alpha9* Dont hard set UTF8 *13.0.1alpha8* FREEPBX-8815 Ordering of allow/disallow in pjsip.endpoint.conf *13.0.1alpha7* FREEPBX-8966 no apply bar after quick create *13.0.1alpha6* FREEPBX-8965 fixed error in creating custom extensions, some virtual extension fixes as well *13.0.1alpha5* Prevent crash during upgrade *13.0.1alpha4* Added load ability for Asterisk Modules *13.0.1alpha3* Hide buttons in grid views on inbound routes and extensions, Adjust sip trunk labels, add confirmation to delete action in trunk grid. *13.0.1alpha2* Reskin. Complete visuals change. Added new functionality. Broke apart drivers.
